function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Promoting development horizontally and maintaining lower density","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread due to close proximity and contact between individuals","Mitigation":"Implementing zoning regulations for lower density, promoting green spaces, and using technology for contact tracing","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, building monitoring sensors","People":"Urban planners, developers, local government","Owner":"Urban planners, local government"},{"Description":"Inclusive urban planning and management of multi-functional public spaces over preventive design strategies","Impact":"Failure to encourage physical activity and enable sedentary lifestyle, leading to lower immunity levels","Mitigation":"Designing public spaces for physical activity, promoting health and wellness programs, and integrating green spaces","Technologies":"Urban green infrastructure, health and wellness apps","People":"Urban planners, public health officials, community organizations","Owner":"Urban planners, public health officials"},{"Description":"Intermixing of public realms, social spaces, and green infrastructure","Impact":"Potential for overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing crowd control measures, designing for physical distancing, and promoting outdoor spaces with adequate ventilation","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring systems, ventilation systems, public space management apps","People":"Urban planners, event organizers, public health officials","Owner":"Urban planners, local government"}]}
